tool_description:
WhatsApp Cloud API. This API deals with a chatting platform based on WhatsApp. The user can send and receive text and media messages through WhatsApp in private chats with the endpoints that are created for the user.

Before using this API you must log in in wa
Log In
- send GET request to /login path
- you will receive in 4-5 sec QR code for authorization
- scan this QR to sign in app

Send a text message:
You can send messages to other recipients:
- send a POST  request to /send/message end...
name: wa-application-api
title: wa-application-api

api_list.name: /logout/{clientPhone}
api_list.description:
logout from your session

IMPORTANT: for using or test this endpoint make sure that you login with your device

required_parameters.name: clientPhone
required_parameters.description: **{clientPhone}** this is phone number of your device with which you login in this API using **/login** endpoint

api_list.name: /clients
api_list.description:
get list of your clients (devices with whatsapp numbers)

IMPORTANT: for using or test this endpoint make sure that you login with your device
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wa-application-api.p.rapidapi.com/clients"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wa-application-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /reboot/{phoneClient}
api_list.description:
reboot client phone controller

IMPORTANT: for using or test this endpoint make sure that you login with your device

required_parameters.name: phoneClient
required_parameters.description: **{clientPhone}** this is phone number of your device with which you login in this API using **/login** endpoint

api_list.name: /contacts/{clientPhone}
api_list.description:
get list of contacts your client number

IMPORTANT: for using or test this endpoitn make sure that you login with your device

required_parameters.name: clientPhone
required_parameters.description: **{clientPhone}** this is phone number of your device with which you login in this API using **/login** endpoint

api_list.name: /dialogs/{clientPhone}
api_list.description:
get list of dialogs your client number

IMPORTANT: for using or test this endpoint make sure that you login with your device

required_parameters.name: clientPhone
required_parameters.description: **{clientPhone}** this is phone number of your device with which you login in this API using **/login** endpoint

api_list.name: /login
api_list.description:
Get QR code for login in response you will get img

- send GET request to /login path
- you will receive in 4-5 sec QR code for authorization
- scan this QR from your device to sign in app
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wa-application-api.p.rapidapi.com/login"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wa-application-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
